channel.title: [PI] Better Combat?
channel.description: Ok, so I am using an older PI Base, and the combat is not completely terrible, but it certainly is not that good. I do not work with combat formulas often so this is new to me. I was wondering what could make combat better? Just fighting players in general, switching, hit delays, etc.. I found a few tutorials but they seem to contradict one another to often. If you know of the best combat base tutorial, please let me know or post your own solutions. Thanks! :D
